---
name: "bicep-guidelines"
description: "Bicep module authoring guidelines and best practices."
applyTo: "**/*.bicep"
---

# Bicep Guidelines

- Author modules to be parameterized and idempotent.
- Use `metadata` and `description` on parameters for discoverability.
- Prefer composition and reusable modules; reference Azure Verified Modules when appropriate.
- Validate with `bicep build` and `bicep decompile` as part of CI.
# Bicep Guidelines

- Author modules to be parameterized and idempotent.
- Use `metadata` and `description` on parameters for discoverability.
- Prefer composition and reusable modules; reference Azure Verified Modules when appropriate.
- Validate with `bicep build` and `bicep decompile` as part of CI.
